Title: Authorizes employees time off to receive the COVID-19 vaccine
Summary: Provides that if an individual does not have sufficient time outside of his or her scheduled working hours to receive the COVID-19 vaccine, he or she may, without loss of pay for up to two hours, take off so much working time as will enable him or her to receive such vaccine; further provides that such time off must be taken at either the beginning or end of his or her working shift, as the employer may designate, unless otherwise mutually agreed; requires the commissioner of health to determine adequate verification of the receipt of such vaccine; makes related provisions.
ActClause: AN ACT to amend the labor law, in relation to authorizing employees time to receive the COVID-19 vaccine
